WRITING.TITLE: Man, both outlast 2 and prey have me disappointed
WRITING.TEXT:
Preys gunplay is kinda weak, like most arcane games. And i dont know why, im just not that into the story so far. Ill stick with it though. Its getting widely praised so this might just be me.
Outlast 2 is just one giant chase sequence. The first game had down moments where you could soak it in, which is needed in a game like that. And since outlast, resident evil 7, alien isolation have come along and let you fight back.
Just two disappointments in a row :(

Mark raised his head from his work just to see the door to his detective agency rattle open. Intrigued by an offer of work during this dry spell in between cheating spouses and fraud investigations, he regarded the scrawny tall man with raised eyebrows. The man looked somewhat dishivelled , shaking from anxiety and permenantly eached worry lines in his face. "Mark Carpenter? I need your services. Urgently. " Even the mans voice was shakey and weak. Mark felt. a surge of pity and was sure he would take the case. It must be bad to leave this man a shell. Mark nodded his head. "Sure. Shoot. Whats the problem bud?" The tall stranger told his strange tale. Of elder gods and blood sacrafice. Of monsters who walk like men. Of evil. But one word caught Mark's attention above all else. Innsmouth. A town whispered in dark corners of the earth . A cursed place no one dared mention. Mark was no religious man, but there was nothing holy about that place. Mark took the mans number and gave him his card. He told him to come back tomorrow.
The man did come back. Marks office was shuttered. The new sign plastered haphazardly over the door now read "out of buisiness". The number the man desperately kept trying to ring was a dead end. The man knew his time was coming to an end. His last chance at help now an empty shell of an office. The last sensation he ever felt was that something was watching him from the shadows.
On a nice beach in florida, the now retired mark sat sipping a pina colada. He often wondered back to that strange desperate man and wondered what happened to him. But then the pinda coladas added up and joined by teqila . He soon forgot.about his cowardice and how he abandoned someone in need.
But one thing he never forgot. Innsmouth. Fuck that place.

WRITING.TITLE: Holy crap...just started season 2 (spoilers)
WRITING.TEXT:
I thought series one was good, first ep of season two blows it away!
That ending...wow. The scream as the detective is thrown out the window is absoloutely blood curdling.
The only complaint i have is her partner seemed really physically weak and is easily overpowered in the series. And when hes told about her death, he doesnt seem particularly bothered even though he seemed romantically interested.
The easter eggs are too time consuming, convoluted, and just arent worth the difficulty. Its not even like its a decent story from the sypnosis i read.

It seems like a shit story too. Time travel? Alternate worlds? Blowing up moons? Its like the most nonsense any "writer" working threw into a sci fi blender without any regard for decent story telling.
